name: Vacation: dayOFF
description:
The Destiny of 6-people in the island

Unique story with in 6 different stories
These stories can be turn follwing your choices.
Collecte achievements and CG! Rewarding by percentage! Mini games!
What is the ending you will make by?

Your choices will lead to misery, and No one may be happy.
Seriously, Do you wanna play?

* A total of 7 heroines! Individual scenarios and Contained true ending!

* Project Manager/Scenario: BloodshedE
* Illustration: Sad Tentacle
* MIO Producer: -In.
